com.github.dkharrat.nexusdata.core

Class PersistentStoreCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdata.core.PersistentStoreCoordinator

  • public class PersistentStoreCoordinator
extends Object
    A PersistentStoreCoordinator is a mediator between a ObjectContext and other PersistentStores. It is used by an ObjectContext to obtain model information and save the object graph. From the perspective of the ObjectContext, a PersistentStoreCoordinator behaves such that a group of PersistentStores appear as one virtual store. This allows the ObjectContext to create the corresponding object graph from the union of the persistence stores that this coordinator covers.

    • Method Detail

      • addStore

        public void addStore(PersistentStore store)
        Adds a persistent store to this coordinator. A persistent store cannot belong to multiple coordinators.
        Parameters:
        store - the persistent store to add

      • removeStore

        public void removeStore(PersistentStore store)
        Removes the specified persistent store from this coordinator.
        Parameters:
        store - the store to remove

      • getPersistentStore

        public PersistentStore getPersistentStore(UUID uuid)
        Returns the persistent store contained in this coordinator that is identified by the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID of the persistent store to return
        Returns:
        the persistent store in this coordinator that matches the specified ID. If no such store exists, null is returned.

      • getPersistentStores

        public List<PersistentStore> getPersistentStores()
        Returns all the persistent stores contained within this coordinator.
        Returns:
        all the persistent stores contained within this coordinator

      • getModel

        public ObjectModel getModel()
        Returns the model associated with this coordinator.
        Returns:
        the model associated with this coordinator

      • objectIDFromUri

        public ObjectID objectIDFromUri(URI objectIDUri)
        Returns the ObjectID from the corresponding URI representation.
        Parameters:
        objectIDUri - the URI that represents the ObjectID
        Returns:
        the ObjectID represented by the specified URI
        Throws:
        {@link - IllegalArgumentException} if the URI represents a temporary ID or the URI is invalid
